snippet.title: Dream in the Shell
snippet.description: When a black sphere appears on Earth, countless people become trapped in endless dreams. The protagonist's wife is among them, compelling him to venture into the dangerous sphere to save her. 'Dream in the Shell' is a story adventure game that explores surreal worlds where dreams, memories, and the subconscious blend. Explore mysterious spaces through unique interactions and uncover the truth.
